Drunk.description: Does not know their role till the third night.

Seer.description: Wake up each night and learn if selected player is good or bad.

Negative.description: You will die on night X. Where X is the number of Werewolves in the game plus one.
The first time you are put up to the stand the person who nominated you dies immediately.
If you ever claim to be Mutant, Village Negative or any other Village Negative role, you are lynched.
When you die, guess a player who you think it on the Village team. If you are wrong whatever team the player you choose is on, wins the game.
If you are killed the next day phase is skipped.
When targeted by Werewolves the target is redirected to an adjacent player, unless both of them are on the Werewolf team.
If lynched randomly one of your neighbours will be lynched as well. You are seen as bad to the seer.
You are a Villager until you are attack by Werewolves, at which time you become a Werewolf.
On the first night choose one person to be your role model if your role model  dies you become a Werewolf. Until then you are a Villager.
Always vote for players to die.
You are a Villager but appear to be bad to Seer's and PI.
You must always abstain when voting to lynch.
You must select someone each night to lie with. If the selected person is a Werewolf you die.

Support.description: Each night select two players. Any actions performed on the one player will be performed on the other, and vice versa.
Once per game, at night, choose a dead player you gain their active and passive abilities and all immunities they would have had until the next night.
If you are the last remaining town the game will not end and if you are lynched, the town wins.
Each night select someone to wake up and learn that you are the friendly neighbour.
Once per game during the day reveal your role, during that day the Village may lynch a second person.
Anyone who visits you at night will not be able to talk the next morning.

Select a player each night to hide behind. If the target you select is a Werewolf they will kill you. Otherwise any attempts to target you will fail. If anyone targets the person you are hiding behind it also targets you.
Select a player each night, if they are a serial killer they become a Villager.
During the day you may reveal your role.
Up to three times in a game during the night choose to leave the Village. Any abilities that target you that night do nothing, you must leave the room for the next day phase.
Everything that happens to the bard at night is narrated to everyone the next morning.
At the start of the game select 4 players, they will be woken up and learn who you are.
If successfully lynched, the player who nominated you first has their role revealed.
Pick a player each night, if that player is on the Werewolf team, they lose all abilites and become a regular Werewolf.
Select a player each night, if that player is protected so are you.
If any Village role is killed, you take over their role.
Once per game, you may pick another player who gets to perform their role's ability twice the next night.
If you die with 4 or more players still alive, you may pick 3 players who will be the only ones to vote in the next voting round.
Immune to night attacks until nominated to the stand.
Pick a player each night, that player can not kill you that night.

Start the game with one taser. You see who targets you at night as long as you have the taser, and may chose to zap the person who targeted you (roleblocking them that and the next night). You lose the taser.
You learn one random town role that is in the game apart from yours or the seers.
If one of your neighbours receive any kind of protection at night you recieve a copy of that protection.
If killed, pick a player whose role is revealed.
If you are attacked by the Werewolves, the Werewolves do not get to attack the following night.
You wake up and learn who the other masons are the first night.
At any point during the day you may reveal yourself. If you do your vote counts for double.

During the voting phase before the results are tallied choose to switch places with the player on the stand. If the village votes innocent nothing will happen if the village votes guilty you will die instead and the person who was going to be hung will receive protection that night.
Cannot be lynched.
Each night pick a player they must not speak the following morning.
You survive your first attack by werewolves at night.
The first night you learn who the seer is.
Each night choose a player, that player's night action does not happen.
You can commune with the dead through a special channel.

Protective.description: During the night the witch can either kill or heal one player. The witch can use only one of the two in a night, and each are one time only if successfully healed.
Wake up each night and select another player, that player may not use their role and they can not be killed.
If the bodyguard dies, you become the bodyguard.
Each night both your neighbours are protected, but are seen as good.

Pick a player other than yourself each night, that player is protected that night. During the day it is announced that they cannot be lynched and their vote counts for double. Each player can only be picked once per game.
If a non-Village role is lynched, you may the following night wake up another player. Neither of you can die.
Once per game you may protect all players except yourself. The next morning anyone attacked that night will be revealed to all players.
Once per game at night choose another player to protect. That player may no longer be killed by Werewolves.
Choose a different player each night to protect. That player cannot be killed that night.
You can choose one other person to protect at night, but instead of the victim dying, you and the attacker both die.
Each night you see who will be killed by the Werewolves, and once per game you may decide to keep them alive as long as it is not yourself.
Each night you may select two other players. If the first player would die instead the second player dies. The first player will die in two nights.

Investigative.description: You can listen in on the Werewolves chat.
Wake up each night and select a player, see who that player targeted if anyone.
Each night, choose a player you learn one Village role and one non-Village role. One of which is that player's actual role.
Each night you are alerted if any of your neighbours are on the Werewolf or Neutral team.
Each night learn how many pairs of Werewolves there are.
Wake up each night and select a player, see who targeted that player if anyone.
May choose once per game to see all people who vote guilty on a target. If used the target is not lynched.
Each night select a player and learn if they have a night action. After the second night control who a player uses their night action on.
Select two players the first learns if the second is good or bad.
Every other night select a dead player, you learn their exact role.
Once per game at night select a player learn if anything they said during the day was a lie or not.
Each night select two players other than yourself. Learn if they are on the same team or not.
When a player is saved from death you learn if they are good or not.
Once per game at night select a player. That player will reveal their role to everyone the next morning.
If the seer dies they will take on the role of the seer.
Each night learn if at least one of your neighbors woke up that night.
Inspect three player who are beside each other each night. You learn if at least one of them is bad.
During the night you may send messages to the moderator. These messages will be sent to all players.
The oracle selects a person each night, if that person dies their role is revealed.

Killing.description: If you are killed the person who killed you dies.
Guess who will be killed that night. If you are correct you may kill someone the next night.
If anyone visits you, they die and you do not.
Choose another player at the start of the game. This player may kill another player when they die. If you die before them you may retract this ability.
Each night you may pick a player. You will attack all players using their nighttime ability on this player.
If the number of living wolf players is great or equal to that of Villagers you may attack a player each night. The Werewolf team can not win the game as long as you are alive.
When a Village Killing dies you take on their role.

Each night select someone that is not your neighbour. If that player is on the wolf team and surrounded by Villager roles you kill the Werewolf. If that player is surrounded by non-Villager roles you kill that player.
If you are killed at night you may perform an attack the next morning. If your target is a Villager role, they become a Kitsune.
If a Village role is lynched you may attack a player the following night. This appears as a wolf attack.
If you are killed, choose someone to kill before you die.
During the day you may reveal yourself. If you do you must immediatly eliminate one person without vote. This uses the Village's lynching that day.
You can kill up to two players in the game, one per night. If you shoot someone on the good team you will shoot yourself the next night.
If someone claims to be a certain role you can reveal yourself. If that player is lying about their role then they die, if that player is telling the truth then you die.
During the night the witch can either kill or heal one player other than themselves. The witch can use only one of the two in a night, and each are one time only if successfully healed.

Werewolf.description: Wakes up each night and selects someone to kill with the other Werewolves.

Killing.description: Wake with the Werewolves. You appear as good.
On the first night on your own choose a companion. You die if they die, but if you die they don't.
Wake with the Werewolves. If you die, the werewolves kill two people the night after.
You don't wake up with the Werewolves until a Werewolf dies. The Werewolves know who you are.
Wake up with the Werewolves. If lynched, select someone their role will be revealed to the Werewolves.
Wake with the Werewolves, you can only select your neighbours to kill.
Wake with the Werewolves, if you are the last killing role on the Werewolves team you may kill two players each night.
Wake with the Werewolves. If you are lynched choose a player that can no longer vote.
Each night you may wake with Werewolves. If you choose not to the seer will see you as good.
Wake with the Werewolves. If you are seen by the Seer, you are awoken to see who the seer is.
Wake with the Werewolves. If you are lynched both your neighbours will be attacked tonight instead of the regular wolf attacks.
Wakes with the Werewolves. The first time you are lynched you may select a non Werewolf team player and name their role. If you are correct that player is killed instead.
Wakes with the wereolves. If your target is not dead you kill an extra player the next night.
Wake with the Werewolves. You can only be killed by lynching.
Wake with the werewolves. If you are the last killing role on the Werewolves team, your attacks ignore protection.
Wakes with the Werewolves. If lynched, pick a player. That player will be lynched as well.
Wakes with the Werewolves. If a player survives your attack, they are permanently seen as bad.
Wakes with the Werewolves. If no one is lynched during the day, you are seen as good during the night.

Support.description: Wakes up every night with the Werewolves, and again after the Werewolves on their own to choose someone to keep silent the day after.
Wake with the Werewolves, if you are the last Werewolf Support alive you will not be converted into a Werewolf.
Each night, wake up and select a person. You learn their exact role. You do not wake with the Werewolves.
You do not wake with the Werewolves. Each night, wake up you may select a person, if that person would be lyched they aren't and the day phase ends.
Wakes up each night with the Werewolves. Wake up again after the Werewolves and select a player to appear as good to the seer.
Wakes up each night with the Werewolves. Wake up again after the Werewolves and select a player to appear as bad to the seer.
Wake with the Werewolves. Wake again to choose a player, that player's night action does not happen.
Wake with the werewolves. The first time you would be converted into a Werewolf instead at random one of your neighbors is.
Do not wake with the Werewolves. Each night select a player, that player's role will be revealed to the other Werewolves, the player revealed will be notified.
Do not wake with the Werewolves. If you are lynched select a player, if they are on the Villager team they will become a Werewolf.
Wake with the Werewolves. Your non-wolf neighbours are seen as bad to the seer.
Wake with the Werewolves. Your neighbours can not be protected.
Do not wake with the Werewolves. If any Village use a night role on you the wolves will be woken up at the end of the night to kill again.
You do not wake with the wolves. Each night you may guess which player the seer is. If you are correct you are both converted to a Werewolf. If you are wrong your role is revealed to the Village.
Do not wake with the Werewolves. Each night select a player, if that player is lynched their role will only be revealed to you and the other Werewolves.
Do not wake with the werewolves. When a werewolf killing role dies become a copy of that role.

True.description: Each night select a player other than yourself to protect, if you protected someone from a different faction as the night before you also protect yourself.
If lynched your neighbours also die. You survive the first time you were attacked by a Werewolf.

If lynched you survive and join the Villager team. If attacked by Werewolves you survive and join the Werewolf team. You do not wake with the Werewolves while on their team. This switch can happen any number of times.
True.seenAs: Good if on Village team. Bad if on Werewolf team.

True.description: Each morning, you are shown the role of all the players successfully killed that night. You may choose to become any of those roles, but will be seen as bad by Investigators. Before that you are seen as good.
True.seenAs: Good until you become another role, then Bad
True.winCon: Transform and fulfil your new role's objective

True.description: Pick a player each night, if you are attacked, your target is attacked instead.
True.winCon: Have a player kill themselves while you are alive

True.description:
You start the game with 2 gold. Each night select one of three actions. 
Action 1: Target yourself and protect yourself, lose 1 gold.
Action 2: Target someone else and role block anyone who visits them, gain 1 gold for each person role blocked.
Actions 3: Target someone else and protect them, if you prevent their death gain 3 gold.

Each night select one of three actions. 
Action 1: Target yourself and protect yourself, max 3 times a game.
Action 2: Target someone else and use a health potion, protecting them.
Actions 3: Target someone else and use a killing potion, max 2 times a game.
Choose a player on the first night. If that player dies you get their power (if any) and join their team.
True.winCon: Transform and fulfil your new role's objective

True.description: Select a player each night and choose a target for that players action. That player is then offered a yes or no question if they would like to do their role on the target the captain has selected. If they choose no they do nothing.
Select a player on the first night. During the night you can protect that player, however you can only protect them twice in a game.
Select two players on the first night. The two players then wake up and see each other. They now only win if their love survives.
True.winCon: Have either the Village or the couple wins

True.description: Select any player who died, you will become their role. Whatever role you take will be announced the next morning.
True.category: Village Random, True Neutral, Neutral Evil
True.winCon: Transform and fulfil your new role's objective

True.description: If you are killed by the Werewolves they do not attack during the next night.

Evil.description: Wakes up each night with the wolves and selects someone to kill with the other Werewolves.
Predict the winning team on the first night. Once per game on a night you can make yourself immune to all attacks.
Evil.winCon: Survive to the end and have your predicted team win. You win alone.

Evil.description: You only win if you are lynched. You can then take revenge on one of the people that voted to kill you.
Select a player on the first night. If the person you selected dies any other way than lynching you must win by lynching yourself.
Each night, add a player to your cult.
Evil.winCon: Have all living players in your cult

Evil.description: Once in a game during the day you can call court. Which stops all discussion and forces an annoymous vote.
Evil.winCon: Survive to see the Village lose

Evil.description: Each day if no one dies or died, you die. If 1/3 of town rounded up dies you no longer die if no one is killed. If 2/3 of town rounded up die you may select a different dead player each night and then select a player to use their ability on. If you select a player without an active night ability they will kill the player.You cannot be killed by Werewolves.
You appear as good to the seer and act as on the Villager team for all other roles.
Evil.winCon: Survive to see the Village lose

Evil.description: Each night your clock will tick down and all Villagers will be notified of this. The clock will start at half the number of players rounded down minus one.
Evil.winCon: Survive to see your clock reach zero

Evil.description: Each night select someone to cover in water, or point at yourself to freeze all people covered in water. A frozen player cannot be killed at night, talk or use their night action.
Each night select a player, if that player is not a Werewolf they become a Furry and you become your previous role or a Villager.
If you are attacked by a non-Werewolf role, survive and turn that player into a ghast.
Evil.winCon: Have any ghast survive to the end

Killing.description: Wakes up every night with the Werewolves. Every other night wake up alone as well as with the Werewolves and kill anyone.
Each night you may message the host once statement, if you say this statement out loud during the day and your statement is truthful you may kill a player the next night.
Select one person each night to be killed. You cannot be killed by Werewolves.
Each night select a player to douse or point at yourself to kill all doused players.
Each night select a player. If they are a Werewolf they die, otherwise they don't. If all wolves are dead, kill one player each night.

Select a player each night to kill. If that player survives they join your team. They wake up with you and keep their original ability. If you die converted can no longer convert players or kill however they still are aligned with you.
Killing.winCon: Have all players join the inquisition

Killing.description: Select a player each night, infect them. An infected player dies the night after.
Each night select someone to kill also kill everyone who visits that person.
On odd nights you appear good as seer and have no ability. On even nights you appear as evil and may select someone to kill.
Killing.seenAs: Good on odd nights, Bad on even nights

Killing.description: Each night select someone if they are on the Villager team remove their ability, they become a rioter. If rioters have magority you kill someone each night instead.
Killing.winCon: Have all players join the riot

Killing.description: Every third night attack one of your neighbours, if the attack fails you wither and die. You cannot be targeted by Werewolves.
You are not affected by any night abilities. Every third round select one of your neighbours to kill. This attack is announced as a Werewolf attack.
If someone was nominated but not hung, you may kill that player at night.

vampire.description: Attack another player each night. That player doesn't die during the night, but dies the next morning if anyone nominated up to stand.
